Reason: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development, and to allow the local planning authority to review any potential changes to the scheme.

Condition : 4 - 13 The total gross external floorspace areas of the uses hereby approved shall be limited to the following:
a)	Overall gross external floorspace of all the uses, including parking, servicing, plant and storage, shall not exceed 478,207sqm GEA (including 84,330sqm of ancillary basements, multi-storey car parking and the football deck extension)
b)	Retail and professional and financial services and food and drink uses (Classes A1 to A5) uses shall not exceed 6,120sqm GEA.
c)	Office (Class B1) use shall not exceed 12,624sqm GEA.
d)	Leisure (Class D2) use shall not exceed 1,678sqm GEA.
e)	Community (Class D1) use shall not exceed 1,650sqm GEA.
f)	Residential (Class C3) use shall not exceed 303,650sqm GEA if maximum office accommodation on the Northern Site is provided, or 309,385sqm GEA if minimum office accommodation on the Northern Site is provided.
g)	Wholesale market (sui generis) use shall not exceed 62,559sqm GEA.
REASON: to restrict the floorspace of the various uses to the levels proposed and assessed, and to ensure a suitable mix of uses within the development.
description: Application under Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act for 'non-material' amendments (to vary the approved Development Specification and condition 13 (e) to allow up to 1,650sqm GEA of Community (Class D1) floorspace to be provided) to planning permission ref. 2014/2810 dated 11/02/2015.
site_name: Food Exchange New Covent Garden Market
